abstract: The company plans to break ground this year on a plant that will produce 10,000 of its energy-storage units known as Megapacks annually.
snippet: The company plans to break ground this year on a plant that will produce 10,000 of its energy-storage units known as Megapacks annually.
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI — Tesla will build a factory in Shanghai to manufacture its large-scale energy-storage battery known as the Megapack, the Chinese state news agency Xinhua reported on Sunday.

abstract: The facility will produce large batteries that will help electric utilities stabilize grids and use more renewable energy.
snippet: The facility will produce large batteries that will help electric utilities stabilize grids and use more renewable energy.
lead_paragraph: Elon Musk, the chief executive of Tesla, announced on Twitter on Sunday that his company would build a factory in Shanghai with the aim to assemble 10,000 giant batteries annually for electric producers and distributors.

abstract: The electric car company’s decision to slash prices appears to have offset the effect of higher interest rates.
snippet: The electric car company’s decision to slash prices appears to have offset the effect of higher interest rates.
lead_paragraph: Tesla sales rose 5 percent in the first three months of the year after it cut prices on its electric cars, helping to compensate for slowing economic growth and rising interest rates.

abstract: A former Tesla factory worker, who is Black, challenged a judge’s earlier award of $15 million, but came away with less in a new trial.
snippet: A former Tesla factory worker, who is Black, challenged a judge’s earlier award of $15 million, but came away with less in a new trial.
lead_paragraph: A federal jury in San Francisco ordered Tesla on Monday to pay about $3.2 million to a Black man who had accused the carmaker of ignoring racial abuse he faced while working at its California factory.

abstract: A court upheld a finding that Tesla wrongly fired a worker involved in labor organizing and that a Twitter post by Elon Musk was illegally anti-union.
snippet: A court upheld a finding that Tesla wrongly fired a worker involved in labor organizing and that a Twitter post by Elon Musk was illegally anti-union.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court on Friday affirmed a finding that Tesla illegally fired an employee involved in union organizing, and that the company’s chief executive, Elon Musk, had illegally threatened workers’ stock options if they chose to unionize.

abstract: As luxury cars become rolling supercomputers, designers are wondering how big is too big.
snippet: As luxury cars become rolling supercomputers, designers are wondering how big is too big.
lead_paragraph: From pocket-stretching smartphones to wall-hogging TVs, Americans have often asked: How much screen is too much?

abstract: The decision by a Texas judge to overturn F.D.A. approval for the abortion pill mifepristone could upend the pharmaceutical industry.
snippet: The decision by a Texas judge to overturn F.D.A. approval for the abortion pill mifepristone could upend the pharmaceutical industry.
lead_paragraph: The decision by a judge in Texas to overturn F.D.A. approval for the abortion pill mifepristone could have consequences far beyond the fraught area of reproductive health, throwing the regulatory regime for medicines into disarray and potentially upending the business of drug making. The ruling to reverse a green light given more than 20 years ago has sparked a furious response from pharmaceutical executives, and the Biden administration is pushing for the decision to be blocked.

abstract: Companies shouldn’t need to build worker housing. Workers shouldn’t have to live in company towns.
snippet: Companies shouldn’t need to build worker housing. Workers shouldn’t have to live in company towns.
lead_paragraph: Elon Musk, who inhabits the role of a gonzo captain of industry like no other figure in modern American life, has lately been dreaming aloud about building his own version of an old-fashioned company town.

abstract: An unexpected decline in the price of an essential battery material, along with those of other commodities, is good news for buyers. But experts disagree on how long low prices will last.
snippet: An unexpected decline in the price of an essential battery material, along with those of other commodities, is good news for buyers. But experts disagree on how long low prices will last.
lead_paragraph: Lithium, the common ingredient in almost all electric-car batteries, has become so precious that it is often called white gold. But something surprising has happened recently: The metal’s price has fallen, helping to make electric vehicles more affordable.

abstract: Boring old Ford is proving to be a very modern company.
snippet: Boring old Ford is proving to be a very modern company.
lead_paragraph: Tesla had me convinced, for a while, that it was a cool company.
